Package tage.input.action

package tage.input.action
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    tage.input
    For managing input devices such as a gamepad.
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractInputAction
    AbstractInputAction is the base class from which all TAGE input actions are derived.
    CameraPitchActionJ
    PitchActionJ nose up/down around local side axis.
    CycleAvatarSelectionAction
    Allows selection of a different textured avatar for multiplayer.
    DropMarkerActionK
    FireMissileAction implements dropping a marker from the avatar.
    FireBulletActionK
    FireMissileAction implements shooting bullets from the avatar.
    FireMissileActionK
    FireMissileAction implements shooting a missile from the avatar.
    ForwardBackActionJ
    ForwardBackActionJ implements forward and backward movement of the Game object.
    ForwardBackActionK
    ForwardBackAction implements moving forward or backward the Game object.
    IAction
    This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by all concrete subclasses of AbstractInputAction.
    PitchActionJ
    PitchActionJ implements pitch up/down of the Game object.
    PitchActionK
    PitchAction implements pitch up/down of the Game object.
    RollActionJ
    RollActionJ rolls the dolphin left/right around its moving direction.
    RollActionK
    RollActionK rolls the dolphin left/right around its moving direction.
    SecondaryViewportPanXActionK
    SecondaryViewportPanXActionK implements panning across the x-axis on the "minimap" viewport.
    SecondaryViewportPanYActionK
    SecondaryViewportPanYActionK implements across the y-axis on the "minimap" viewport.
    SecondaryViewportZoomActionK
    SecondaryViewportZoomActionK implements zooming in and out of the "minimap" viewport.
    SelectAvatarAction
    Allows selection of a different textured avatar for multiplayer.
    YawActionJ
    YawActionJ turn the dolphin left/right around the world Y axis.
    YawActionK
    YawActionK turn the dolphin left/right around the world Y axis.
